snippet: Campbell Brown has become a vocal participant in the debate over the role of unions in disciplinary actions against teachers accused of sexual misconduct.
abstract: Campbell Brown, former CNN anchor and mother of two, has begun to assert herself into the uncomfortable political debate over the role of unions in disciplinary actions taken by the New York City Education Dept against public school teachers accused of sexual misconduct.
lead_paragraph: Campbell Brown has become a vocal participant in the debate over the role of unions in disciplinary actions against teachers accused of sexual misconduct.

headline.seo: Campbell Brown Wades Into Debate Over Teachers Unions
headline.main: Ex-CNN Anchor Joins Debate vs. Unions Over Teacher Misconduct
headline.print_headline: Ex-CNN Anchor Joins Debate vs. Unions Over Teacher Misconduct
